events.message: The insured reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of May 10th, involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured's vehicle in a traffic collision.
An agent was assigned promptly to handle the insured's car accident claim to ensure timely service and assistance.
The claim has been officially acknowledged by the insurance team, and the insured was notified about the next steps.
The insured was asked to provide the police report and photos of the vehicle damage to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including the police report and photographic evidence were submitted by the insured on time.
The claims investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and gathering additional information regarding the accident circumstances.
The investigation on the car accident claim was completed after verifying all reports and confirming liability for the damages.
A settlement offer was proposed to the insured covering the repair costs for the vehicle damage as per the policy terms.
The insured provided positive feedback expressing appreciation for the fast and clear communication during the claim process.
The claim was formally approved following the acceptance of the settlement proposal by the insured party.
Claim payment was issued promptly to the insuredâ€™s account to cover the vehicle repairs as agreed in the settlement.
The insurance claim was officially closed after confirming that the insured had received payment and completed the vehicle repairs.
The files and documents related to the insured's auto accident claim were securely archived for future reference and compliance.
